sequence:
Hammann Observation Diary

<size=45>Chapter 1: The Ill-Tempered Secretary</size>

scripts.say: The report that I submitted! You still haven't gone over it?

options.content: I still haven't finished looking over the reports from three hours ago...
Didn't I say you could submit that report tomorrow?

scripts.say: I left it on your desk an hour ago! Why haven't you looked at it yet?
If you said you haven't looked at it, then that means you haven't looked at it! After I put all that time and effort into writing the report, how do you plan to make it up to me?
*mumbles* ...and here, I was going to give you a reward if you already finished checking it...
Why'd you start mumbling all of a sudden...
None of your business! Finish reading that report this instant so you can take me... I mean, give me orders!
You have to oversee the training exercises next, right? I might not be around after that, so speak now or forever hold your peace!
... What do you mean you don't have any work for me right this second...?! You've been so busy over there, so why aren't you letting me help?
Argh, what a pain! Just hurry up and go to those exercises already!
For some reason, Hammann chased me out of the office.
